article.heading: Presidential ambitions
article.paragraph: In October 2013, theNew York Postreported that Schwarzenegger was exploring a future run forPresident of the United Statespresident. The former California governor would face aUnited States Constitutionconstitutionalhurdle;Natural-born-citizen clauseArticle II, Section I, Clause Vnominally prevents individuals who are not natural-born citizens of the United States from assuming the office. He has reportedly been lobbying legislators about a possibleArticle Five of the United States Constitutionconstitutional change, or filing a legal challenge to the provision.Columbia Universitylaw professorMichael C. DorfMichael Dorfobserved that Schwarzenegger's possible lawsuit could ultimately win him the right to run for the office, noting, "The law is very clear, but its not 100 percent clear that the courts would enforce that law rather than leave it to the political process."cite newsArnold lobbies for White House runSmith, E.http://pagesix.com/2013/10/18/schwarzenegger-mounting-legal-challenge-to-run-for-president/New York PostOctober 18, 2013October 19, 2013
article.heading: Business career
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger has had a highly successful business career.Following his move to the United States, Schwarzenegger became a "prolific goal setter" and would write his objectives at the start of the year on index cards, like starting a mail order business or buying a new car  and succeed in doing so.By the age of 30, Schwarzenegger was a millionaire, well before his career in Hollywood. His financial independence came from his success as a budding entrepreneur with a series of successful business ventures and investments.
article.heading: Bricklaying business
article.paragraph: In 1968, Schwarzenegger and fellow bodybuilderFranco Columbustarted a bricklaying business. The business flourished thanks to the pair's marketing savvy and an increased demand following the1971 San Fernando earthquake.cite webReal Life Action HeroMillionaire Magazinehttp://www.millionaire.com/interviews_schwarzenegger.htmApril 18, 2008MorganKayahttps://web.archive.org/web/20080430152434/http://www.millionaire.com/interviews_schwarzenegger.htmApril 30, 2008nocite web"Working" OutSchwarzenegger.comhttp://www.schwarzenegger.com/en/life/didyouknow/life_didyouknow_eng_legacy_257.asp?secApril 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080523204758/http%3A//www.schwarzenegger.com/en/life/didyouknow/life_didyouknow_eng_legacy_257.asp%3Fsec%3Dlife%26subsec%3DdidyouknowMay 23, 2008yesSchwarzenegger and Columbu used profits from their bricklaying venture to start a mail order business, selling bodybuilding and fitness-related equipment and instructional tapes.
article.heading: Investments
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger rolled profits from the mail order business and his bodybuilding competition winnings into his first real estate investment venture: an apartment building he purchased for $10,000. He would later go on to invest in a number of real estate holding companies.cite newsSchwarzenegger reveals pumped-up financesSan Francisco Chroniclehttp://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fAugust 10, 2003April 18, 2008WilliamsLancehttps://web.archive.org/web/20080318192048/http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fMarch 18, 2008nocite webThe Best Salesman in America?Selling Powerhttp://www.sellingpower.com/article/display.asp?aidApril 18, 2008FleschnerMalcolmhttps://web.archive.org/web/20080224112746/http://www.sellingpower.com/article/display.asp?aidFebruary 24, 2008

Schwarzenegger was a founding celebrity investor in thePlanet Hollywoodchain of international theme restaurants (modeled after theHard Rock Cafe) along withBruce Willis,Sylvester StalloneandDemi Moore. Schwarzenegger severed his financial ties with the business in early 2000.Cite newshttp://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/619317.stmArnie's Planet Hollywood split[[BBC]]January 26, 2000April 1, 2012cite newshttp://articles.latimes.com/2000/jan/26/business/fi-57832It's Hasta la Vista, Planet HollywoodPaulLieberman[[Los Angeles Times]]January 26, 2000April 1, 2012Schwarzenegger said the company had not had the success he had hoped for, claiming he wanted to focus his attention on "new US global business ventures" and his movie career.

He also invested in a shopping mall inColumbus, Ohio. He has talked about some of those who have helped him over the years in business: "I couldn't have learned about business without a parade of teachers guiding me... fromMilton FriedmantoDonald Trump... and now,Les WexnerandWarren Buffett. I even learned a thing or two from Planet Hollywood, such as when to get out! And I did!"He has significant ownership inDimensional Fund Advisors, an investment firm.cite newsWeinraubBernardSchwarzenegger's Next Goal On Dogged, Ambitious PathThe New York Timeshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resAugust 17, 2003April 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080530084234/http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resMay 30, 2008noSchwarzenegger is also the owner of Arnold's Sports Festival, which he started in 1989 and is held annually in Columbus, Ohio. It is a festival that hosts thousands of international health and fitness professionals which has also expanded into a three-day expo. He also owns a movie production company called Oak Productions, Inc. and Fitness Publications, a joint publishing venture withSimon & Schuster.cite webhttp://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/7-self-made-immigrant-millionaires.html?pt7 self-made immigrant millionairesYahoo CanadaNovember 9, 2012November 17, 2012Andrea N. Browne
article.heading: Restaurant
article.paragraph: In 1992, Schwarzenegger and his wife opened a restaurant inSanta MonicacalledSchatzi On Main.Schatziliterally means "little treasure," colloquial for "honey" or "darling" in German. In 1998, he sold his restaurant.cite webThe foundation for taxpayer and consumer rights is in the wrong in its junk fax lawsuit where it falsely blames Arnold Schwarzenegger for faxes sent to promote a restaurant he doesn't ownSchwarzenegger.comhttp://www.schwarzenegger.com/en/news/uptotheminute/news_uptotheminute_eng_legacy_16.asp?secApril 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080523204836/http%3A//www.schwarzenegger.com/en/news/uptotheminute/news_uptotheminute_eng_legacy_16.asp%3Fsec%3Dnews%26subsec%3DuptotheminuteMay 23, 2008yes
article.heading: Celebrity Apprentice
article.paragraph: In September 2015, it was announced Schwarzenegger would replaceDonald Trumpas host ofCelebrity Apprentice.http://money.cnn.com/2015/09/14/media/arnold-schwarzenegger-apprentice-nbc/
article.heading: Personal life
Early relationships
article.paragraph: In 1969, Schwarzenegger met Barbara Outland (later Barbara Outland Baker), an English teacher he lived with until 1974.cite newsArnie's ex-girlfriend pens memoirSeptember 9, 2003http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/showbiz/3092740.stmBBCApril 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080422031941/http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/showbiz/3092740.stmApril 22, 2008noSchwarzenegger talked about Barbara in hismemoirin 1977: "Basically it came down to this: she was a well-balanced woman who wanted an ordinary, solid life, and I was not a well-balanced man, and hated the very idea of ordinary life."Baker has described Schwarzenegger as "[a] joyful personality, totally charismatic, adventurous, and athletic" but claims towards the end of the relationship he became "insufferable  classically conceited  the world revolved around him".cite newsActor's old flame says he's a great guySeptember 15, 2003http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fThe San Francisco ChronicleApril 19, 2007LanceWilliamsBaker published her memoir in 2006, entitledArnold and Me: In the Shadow of the Austrian Oak.cite newsCatherineElsworthArnie puts his weight behind ex-lover's tell-all memoirSeptember 14, 2006http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/1528857/Arnie-puts-his-weight-behind-ex-lover%27s-tell-all-memoir.htmlThe Daily TelegraphLondonApril 18, 2008Although Baker, at times, painted an unflattering portrait of her former lover, Schwarzenegger actually contributed to the tell-all book with a foreword, and also met with Baker for three hours.Baker claims, for example, that she only learned of his being unfaithful after they split, and talks of a turbulent and passionate love life.Schwarzenegger has made it clear that their respective recollection of events can differ.The couple first met six to eight months after his arrival in the U.S their first date was watching theApollo 11first Apollo Moon landingon television.They shared anapartmentinSanta Monicafor three and a half years, and having little money, would visit the beach all day, or have barbecues in the back yard.Although Baker claims that when she first met him, he had "little understanding of polite society" and she found him a turn-off, she says, "He's as much a self-made man as it's possible to be he never got encouragement from his parents, his family, his brother. He just had this huge determination to prove himself, and that was very attractive ... I'll go to my grave knowing Arnold loved me."

Schwarzenegger met his next paramour, Sue Moray, aBeverly Hillshairdresser's assistant, onVenice Beachin July 1977. According to Moray, the couple led an open relationship: "We were faithful when we were both in LA ... but when he was out of town, we were free to do whatever we wanted."Schwarzenegger metMaria Shriverat the Robert F. Kennedy Tennis Tournament in August 1977, and went on to have a relationship with both women until August 1978, when Moray (who knew of his relationship with Shriver) issued an ultimatum.
article.heading: Marriage and family
article.paragraph: File:Arnold Schwarzenegger and Maria Schriver-mod.jpgthumbrightSchwarzenegger with his wifeMaria Shriverat the 2007Special Olympicsin Shanghai, ChinaFile:Arnoldandson.jpgthumbleft200pxSchwarzenegger and his sonPatrick SchwarzeneggerPatrickatEdwards Air Force Base,Californiain December 2002On April 26, 1986, Schwarzenegger married television journalistMaria Shriver, niece of PresidentJohn F. Kennedy, inHyannis, Massachusetts. The Rev. John Baptist Riordan performed the ceremony at St. Francis Xavier Catholic Church.cite newsMaria Owings Shriver Wed To Arnold SchwarzeneggerThe New York Timeshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resApril 27, 1986April 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080528091553/http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resMay 28, 2008noThey have four children:Katherine SchwarzeneggerKatherine Eunice Schwarzenegger(born December 13, 1989 in Los Angeles); Christina Maria Aurelia Schwarzenegger (born July 23, 1991 in Los Angeles);cite newshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resChronicleThe New York TimesJuly 24, 1991April 18, 2008EricPacePatrick SchwarzeneggerPatrick Arnold Shriver Schwarzenegger(born September 18, 1993 in Los Angeles);cite newshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resChronicleThe New York TimesSeptember 21, 1993April 18, 2008NadineBrozanand Christopher Sargent Shriver Schwarzenegger (born September 27, 1997 in Los Angeles).cite newshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resChronicleThe New York TimesSeptember 30, 1997April 18, 2008NadineBrozanSchwarzenegger lives in aconvert11000sqftm2onhome inBrentwood, Los AngelesBrentwood.cite newsNext Stop – Governor's Mansion?Forbeshttp://www.forbes.com/2003/06/27/cx_bs_0627movers.htmlJune 27, 2003April 18, 2008SchiffmanBetsycite newsThe Mind Behind the Muscles[[Time (magazine)|Time]]http://www.time.com/time/printout/0,8816,474589,00.htmlAugust 10, 2003April 18, 2008LacayoRichardThe divorcing couple currently own vacation homes inSun Valley, IdahoandHyannis Port, Massachusetts.cite webCatching Up With Maria ShriverSacramento Magazinehttp://www.sacmag.com/media/Sacramento-Magazine/May-2004/Catching-Up-With-Maria-Shriver/May 2004April 18, 2008DuntemanDaynahttps://web.archive.org/web/20080421233026/http://www.sacmag.com/media/Sacramento-Magazine/May-2004/Catching-Up-With-Maria-Shriver/April 21, 2008noThey attendedSt. Monica Catholic Church (Santa Monica, California)St. Monica's Catholic Church.cite webMaria Shriver Ends Her Silence On Husband's CampaignNBChttp://www.knbc.com/politics/2463270/detail.htmlSeptember 8, 2003April 18, 2008Following their separation, it is reported that Schwarzenegger is dating physical therapist Heather Milligan.cite webLimKennethArnold Schwarzenegger's 'Terminator Genisys' Rakes in $37.9 Million in China After Two Days of Screeninghttp://www.inquisitr.com/2372774/arnold-schwarzeneggers-genisys-rakes-in-37-9m-in-china-after-two-days-of-screening/The Inquisitr NewsThe Inquisitr NewsAugust 28, 2015http://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-3145418/Arnold-Schwarzenegger-girlfriend-Heather-Milligan-arrive-LAX-prepare-getaway-together.html
article.heading: Marital separation
article.paragraph: On May 9, 2011, Shriver and Schwarzenegger ended their relationship after 25 years of marriage, with Shriver moving out of the couple's Brentwood mansion.cite newshttp://www.latimes.com/news/politics/la-mew-arnold-maria-separate-20010510,0,2542211.story?trackArnold Schwarzenegger, Maria Shriver announce separationLos Angeles TimesMay 9, 2011Mark Z. Barabakcite newshttp://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/style/arnold-schwarzenegger-and-wife-of-25-years-maria-shriver-say-theyre-separating/2011/05/10/AF16qwdG_story.htmlArnold Schwarzenegger and wife of 25 years, Maria Shriver, say they’re separatingThe Washington PostMay 10, 2011Associated PressSteveHendrixcite newshttp://www.reuters.com/article/2011/05/10/us-schwarzenegger-idUSTRE7490PP20110510Arnold Schwarzenegger, wife Maria Shriver separateReutersMay 10, 2011Dan WhitcombOn May 16, 2011, theLos Angeles Timesrevealed that Schwarzenegger had fathered a son more than fourteen years earlier with an employee in their household, Mildred Patricia 'Patty' Baena.cite newshttp://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2011/05/17/2011-05-17_mildred_baena_50_identified_as_mother_of_arnold_schwarzeneggers_love_child_tmz_r.html?rMildred 'Patty' Baena, 50, identified as the mother of Arnold Schwarzenegger's out of wedlock child: reportsNancyDillonDaily NewsNew YorkOctober 18, 2011May 17, 2011cite newshttp://www.foxnews.com/politics/2011/05/17/report-schwarzenegger-fathered-child-household-employeeSchwarzenegger Fathered Child With Household Staff MemberFoxMay 17, 2011cite webhttp://www.ibtimes.com/articles/147401/20110518/mildred-patricia-baena-mother-of-arnold-schwarzenegger-s-out-of-wedlock-child-revealed-photos.htmMildred Patricia Baena, Mother of Arnold Schwarzenegger's Out of Wedlock Child Revealed (PHOTOS)International Business TimesOctober 18, 2011"After leaving the governor's office I told my wife about this event, which occurred over a decade ago," Schwarzenegger said in a statement issued toThe Times. In the statement, Schwarzenegger did not mention that he had confessed to his wife only after Shriver had confronted him with the information, which she had done after confirming with the housekeeper what she had suspected about the child.cite newshttp://www.smh.com.au/lifestyle/people/how-maria-found-out-arnies-wife-reportedly-confronted-lover-about-child-20110520-1evji.html?fromHow Maria found out: Arnie's wife reportedly confronted lover about childThe Sydney Morning HeraldMay 20, 2011

Fifty-year-old Baena, ofGuatemalanorigin, was employed by the family for 20 years and retired in January 2011.cite newshttp://www.latimes.com/news/nationworld/nation/la-me-0517-arnold-20110517,0,312678.storySchwarzenegger fathered a with child his mistress, longtime member of the household staffLos Angeles TimesMark Z.BarabakVictoriaKimMay 17, 2011The pregnant Baena was working in the home while Shriver was pregnant with the youngest of the couples four children.cite newshttp://www.nytimes.com/2011/05/18/us/18schwarzenegger.html?pagewantedSchwarzenegger Whispers Become an AdmissionThe New York TimesAdamNagourneyJenniferSteinhauerMay 17, 2011Baena's son with Schwarzenegger, Joseph,cite webhttp://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/Showbiz-News/Arnold-Schwarzenegger-Bought-A-200K-House-For-His-Ex-Housekeeper-And-Their-Teenage-Son-Say-Reports/Article/201105315995018?lposArnie 'Bought Home For Love Child And Mum'Skywas born on October 2, 1997;cite newshttp://www.chicagotribune.com/news/chi-0518-cnn-arnold-child,0,7850501.storySchwarzenegger's son with housekeeper born days after Shriver gave birthChicago Tribuneyeshttps://web.archive.org/20131106001523/http://www.chicagotribune.com/news/chi-0518-cnn-arnold-child,0,7850501.storyNovember 6, 2013Shriver gave birth to Christopher on September 27, 1997.cite newshttp://www.cnn.com/2011/US/05/18/california.schwarzenegger/index.html?irefArnold Schwarzenegger's two sons born days apartAlanDukeCNNMay 19, 2011Schwarzenegger says it took seven or eight years before he found out that he had fathered a child with his housekeeper. It wasn't until the boy "started looking like me, that's when I kind of got it. I put things together," the action star and former California governor, told60 Minutes.Arnold Schwarzenegger: The Boy 'Started Looking Like Me'People, October 1, 2012Schwarzenegger has taken financial responsibility for the child "from the start and continued to provide support."cite webhttp://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/43057177/ns/us_news-life/t/schwarzenegger-i-fathered-secret-child/Schwarzenegger: I fathered a secret childMSNBCMay 17, 2011October 9, 2011KNX (AM)KNX 1070radio reported that in 2010 he bought a new four-bedroom house, with a pool, for Baena and their son inBakersfield, CaliforniaBakersfield, aboutconvert112mikm0north of Los Angeles.cite webhttp://losangeles.cbslocal.com/2011/05/18/schwarzenegger-reportedly-bought-housekeeper-4-bedroom-homeSchwarzenegger Reportedly Fired Housekeeper 4 Weeks AgoCBSOctober 18, 2011Baena separated from her husband, Rogelio, in 1997, a few months after Joseph's birth, and filed for divorce in 2008.cite webhttp://www.express.co.uk/posts/view/248741/Ex-husband-of-Schwarzenegger-mistress-speaks-outExhusband of Schwarzenegger's mistress speaks outDaily ExpressMay 25, 2011October 9, 2011Baena's ex-husband says that the child's birth certificate was falsified and that he plans to sue Schwarzenegger for engaging in conspiracy to falsify a public document, a serious crime in California.Ex-husband of Schwarzenegger's lover plans to sue(AFP) May 29, 2011

Schwarzenegger has consulted an attorney, Bob Kaufman. Kaufman has earlier handled divorce cases for celebrities such asJennifer AnistonandReese Witherspoon.cite webhttp://research.lawyers.com/news-headline/Likely-course-divorce--Shrivers-hire-of-powerhouse-lawyer-doesnt-bode-well-for-marriage-l:1421379567.html?methodLegal News HeadlinesResearch.lawyers.comOctober 9, 2011cite webhttp://www.tmz.com/2011/06/01/arnold-schwarzenegger-officially-hires-divorce-lawyer-bob-kaufman-maria-shriver-laura-wasser-scandal-love-child-mildred-patty-baena/Arnold Schwarzenegger Officially Hires Attorney Bob Kaufman, Hammers Out Divorce Deets with Maria ShriverTMZ.comOctober 9, 2011Schwarzenegger will keep the Brentwood home as part of their divorce settlement and Shriver has purchased a new home nearby so that the children may travel easily between their parents' homes. They will share custody of the two minor children.cite newsReichAshleySchwarzenegger–Shriver Divorce: Settlement Decides Who Gets House, Kidshttp://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/07/08/schwarzenegger-shriver-divorce_n_893470.htmlThe Huffington PostJuly 8, 2011Schwarzenegger came under fire after the initial petition did not include spousal support and a reimbursement of attorney's fees.However, he claims this was not intentional and that he signed the initial documents without having properly read them.Schwarzenegger has filed amended divorce papers remedying this.cite newshttp://latimesblogs.latimes.com/gossip/2011/07/christopher-schwarzenegger-maria-shriver-arnold.htmlLos Angeles TimesMinistry of GossipOctober 18, 2011July 27, 2011

After the scandal, actressBrigitte Nielsencame forward and stated that she too had an affair with Schwarzenegger while he was in a relationship with Shriver,cite webZervosCassiehttp://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/world/love-rat-arnold-arnold-schwarzenegger-cheated-with-me-brigitte-nielsen/story-e6frf7lf-1226069058271Love rat Arnold Schwarzenegger cheated with me: Brigitte NielsenHerald SunAustraliaJune 4, 2011October 9, 2011saying, "Maybe I wouldn't have got into it if he said 'I'm going to marry Maria' and this is dead serious, but he didn't, and our affair carried on."When asked in 2014 "Of all the things you are famous for ... which are you least proud of?", Schwarzenegger replied "I'm least proud of the mistakes I made that caused my family pain and split us up".cite webhttp://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/1vshw2/iamarnold_ama_20/IamArnold. AMA 2.0.RedditJanuary 21, 2014Schwarzenegger, Arnold
article.heading: Accidents and injuries
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger was born with abicuspid aortic valve, an aortic valve with only two leaflets (a normal aortic valve has three leaflets).cite newsSurgery Leaves Star Undimmedhttp://www.thefreelibrary.com/NEWS+LITE+:+SURGERY+LEAVES+STAR+UNDIMMED-a083864140The Free LibraryFarlexApril 18, 1997July 29, 2008cite webStarnesDr. Vaughn A.Renowned Cardiac Surgeon Proclaims Medical "Facts" In Article "Represent No Facts At All"March 8, 2001http://www.schwarzenegger.com/en/news/uptotheminute/news_uptotheminute_eng_legacy_18.asp?secMarch 3, 2009https://web.archive.org/web/20080523203941/http%3A//www.schwarzenegger.com/en/news/uptotheminute/news_uptotheminute_eng_legacy_18.asp%3Fsec%3Dnews%26subsec%3DuptotheminuteMay 23, 2008yesSchwarzenegger opted in 1997 for a replacement heart valve made of his own transplanted tissue; medical experts predicted he would require heart valve replacement surgery in the following two to eight years as his valve would progressively degrade. Schwarzenegger apparently opted against a mechanical valve, the only permanent solution available at the time of his surgery, because it would have sharply limited his physical activity and capacity to exercise.cite newsSchwarzenegger Has Elective Heart SurgeryThe New York Timeshttp://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resApril 18, 1997April 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080530084553/http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?resMay 30, 2008no

On December 9, 2001, he broke six ribs and was hospitalized for four days after a motorcycle crash in Los Angeles.cite newsAssociated PressSchwarzenegger, son get in motorcycle accidentUSA Todayhttp://www.usatoday.com/news/nation/2006-01-09-schwarzenegger-accident_x.htmJanuary 9, 2006April 18, 2008

Schwarzenegger saved a drowning man's life in 2004 while on vacation in Hawaii by swimming out and bringing him back to shore.cite newshttp://usatoday30.usatoday.com/life/2004-04-10-arnold-swimmer_x.htmSchwarzenegger helped swimmer in Maui, according to his officeUSA TodayApril 12, 2004January 22, 2015

On January 8, 2006, while Schwarzenegger was riding hisHarley Davidsonmotorcycle in Los Angeles, with his son Patrick in the sidecar, another driver backed into the street he was riding on, causing him and his son to collide with the car at a low speed. While his son and the other driver were unharmed, the governor sustained a minor injury to his lip, requiring 15 stitches. "No citations were issued", said Officer Jason Lee, aLos Angeles Police Departmentspokesman.cite webhttp://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/10811025/No Charges Against SchwarzeneggerMSNBCJuly 13, 2008Schwarzenegger did not obtain his motorcycle license until July 3, 2006.cite newsNavarroMireyaSchwarzenegger Finally Gets a Licensehttp://www.nytimes.com/2006/07/07/us/07arnold.html?_rFebruary 2, 2011[[The New York Times]]July 7, 2006

Schwarzenegger tripped over his ski pole and broke his rightfemurwhile skiing inSun Valley, Idaho, with his family on December 23, 2006.cite newsAssociated PressCalif. Gov. Schwarzenegger Breaks Leg in Skiing Accident in IdahoFox News Channelhttp://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,238562,00.htmlDecember 24, 2006April 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080414041257/http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,238562,00.htmlApril 14, 2008noOn December 26, 2006, he underwent a 90-minute operation in which cables and screws were used to wire the broken bone back together. He was released from theSt. John's Health Centeron December 30, 2006.cite newsSchwarzenegger cleared to resume duties after surgeryLos Angeles TimesDecember 26, 2006

Schwarzenegger's private jet made an emergency landing atVan Nuys Airporton June 19, 2009, after the pilot reported smoke coming from the cockpit, according to a statement released by the governor's press secretary. No one was harmed in the incident.cite newsNicoleSanta CruzGovernor's plane makes emergency landing in Van NuysJune 19, 2009Los Angeles Timeshttp://latimesblogs.latimes.com/lanow/2009/06/governors-plane-makes-emergency-landing-in-van-nuys.htmlJune 20, 2009https://web.archive.org/web/20090623225503/http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/lanow/2009/06/governors-plane-makes-emergency-landing-in-van-nuys.htmlJune 23, 2009no
article.heading: Height
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger's official height of 6'2" (1.88 m) has been brought into question by several articles. In his bodybuilding days in the late 1960s, he was measured to be 6'1.5" (1.87 m), a height confirmed by his fellow bodybuilders.cite webArnold Schwarzenegger Height, Schwarzenegger'scelebheights.comhttp://www.celebheights.com/s/Arnold-Schwarzenegger-177.htmlApril 18, 2008cite webSchwarzenegger MeasuredArnoldHeighthttp://www.arnoldheight.com/article5.htmlOctober 18, 2011However, in 1988 both theDaily MailandTime Outmagazine mentioned that Schwarzenegger appeared noticeably shorter.Andrews, N: "True Myths: The life and times of Arnold Schwarzenegger," page 157. Bloomsbury, 2003Prior to running for Governor, Schwarzenegger's height was once again questioned in an article by theChicago Reader.cite webPoor RecallChicago Readerhttp://www.chicagoreader.com/hottype/2003/030919_1.htmlSeptember 23, 2003April 18, 2008MinerMichaelhttps://web.archive.org/web/20080423133904/http://www.chicagoreader.com/hottype/2003/030919_1.htmlApril 23, 2008noAs Governor, Schwarzenegger engaged in a light-hearted exchange with AssemblymanHerb Wessonover their heights. At one point, Wesson made an unsuccessful attempt to, in his own words, "settle this once and for all and find out how tall he is" by using a tailor's tape measure on the Governor.cite newsIncoming governor's mantra: 'Action'San Francisco Chroniclehttp://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fileOctober 23, 2003April 18, 2008SalladayRoberthttps://web.archive.org/web/20080328131723/http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fileMarch 28, 2008noSchwarzenegger retaliated by placing a pillow stitched with the words "Need a lift?" on the five-foot-five inch (165 cm) Wesson's chair before a negotiating session in his office.cite webSchwarzenegger BlinkedNational Conference of State Legislatorshttps://www.ncsl.org/programs/pubs/slmag/2004/04SLDec_Schwarzenegger.pdfApril 18, 2008WeintraubDanielPDFhttps://web.archive.org/web/20080414021559/https://www.ncsl.org/programs/pubs/slmag/2004/04SLDec_Schwarzenegger.pdfApril 14, 2008noBob Mulhollandalso claimed Schwarzenegger was 5'10" (1.78 m) and that he wore risers in his boots.cite webhttp://www.arnoldwatch.org/articles/articles_000488.php3The Governator II: At first it seemed like a bad jokeArnoldwatch.orgOctober 7, 2004March 8, 2010In 1999,Men's Health (magazine)Men's Healthmagazine stated his height was 5'10".cite newshttp://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/politics/campaigns/wh2000/stories/tall080399.htmThe Shrinking FieldThe Washington PostAugust 3, 1999July 23, 2012Mathews, Jay
article.heading: Autobiography
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger's autobiography,Total Recall,was released in October 2012. He devotes one chapter called "The Secret" to his extramarital affair. The majority of his book is about his successes in the three major chapters in his life: bodybuilder, actor, and Governor of California.cite webhttp://abclocal.go.com/kabc/story?sectionArnold Schwarzenegger talks scandal, new book with '60 Minutes'Abclocal.go.comSeptember 28, 2012January 22, 2015
article.heading: Vehicles
article.paragraph: Schwarzenegger was the first civilian to purchase aHumvee. He was so enamored by the vehicle that he lobbied the Humvee's manufacturer,AM General, to produce astreet-legal vehiclestreet-legal, civilian version, which they did in 1992; the first twoHummer H1Hummersthey sold were also purchased by Schwarzenegger.cite webThe Hummer and Schwarzenegger: They probably won't be backFebruary 28, 2010http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/26/AR2010022603248.html2015-10-04

He was in the news in 2014 for buying a rareBugatti VeyronBugatti Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse. This supercar set various World Records for speed and acceleration and is very rare. Arnold Schwarzenegger was spotted and filmed in 2015 Summer in his car, silver painted with bright aluminium forged wheels. Schwarzenegger's Bugatti has its interior adorned in luxurious dark brown leather.Cite webTerminator acelera no seu Bugatti Veyronhttp://www.maismotores.net/2015/08/terminator-acelera-no-seu-bugatti-veyron/2015-08-11
article.heading: Net worth
article.paragraph: See alsoList of richest American politiciansSchwarzenegger's net worth had been conservatively estimated at $100$200 million.cite newsWilliamsLanceSchwarzenegger worth $100 million, experts sayAugust 17, 2003http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fileSan Francisco ChronicleApril 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080328121715/http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?fileMarch 28, 2008noAfter separating from his wife,Maria Shriver, in 2011, it has been estimated that his net worth has been approximately $400 million, and even as high as $800 million, based on tax returns he filed in 2006.cite webhttp://extratv.warnerbros.com/2011/05/arnold_and_marias_surprise_split_how_much_is_at_stake_in_divorce.phpArnold and Maria's Surprise Split: How Much is at Stake in Divorce?Extratv.warnerbros.comMay 10, 2011October 9, 2011cite webMatthewsMarkhttp://abclocal.go.com/kgo/story?sectionGov. Schwarzenegger's Tax Returns ReleasedAbclocal.go.comApril 15, 2006October 9, 2011Over the years as an investor, he invested his bodybuilding and movie earnings in an array ofstocks,bond (finance)bonds, privately controlled companies, and real estate holdings worldwide, so a more accurate estimation of his net worth is difficult to calculate, particularly in light of declining real estate values owing to2007 financial crisiseconomic recessions in the United StatesandEurozone crisisEuropesince 2007. In June 1997, Schwarzenegger spent $38 million of his own money on a private Gulfstream jet.cite bookFlemingCharles[[High concept: Don Simpson and the Hollywood Culture of Excess]]Bloomsbury1999978-0-7475-4262-9Schwarzenegger once said of his fortune, "Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million, but I was just as happy when I had $48 million."He has also stated, "I've made many millions as a businessman many times over."
article.heading: Activism
article.paragraph: File:Arnold Schwarzenegger 2003.jpgthumbArnold Schwarzenegger in 2003The Hummers that Schwarzenegger bought 1992 are so large each weighsconvert6300lbkgonand isconvert7ftmwide that they are classified as large trucks, and U.S. fuel economy regulations do not apply to them. During the gubernatorial recall campaign he announced that he would convert one of his Hummers to burn hydrogen. The conversion was reported to have cost about US$21,000. After the election, he signed an executive order to jump-start the building of hydrogen refueling plants called theCalifornia Hydrogen HighwayCalifornia Hydrogen Highway Network, and gained aU.S. Department of Energygrant to help pay for its projected US$91,000,000 cost.cite webThanks to Arnold, California to Pave the Hydrogen HighwayBMW Worldhttp://www.usautoparts.net/bmw/hydrogen/schwarzenegger.htmApril 18, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080316051803/http://www.usautoparts.net/bmw/hydrogen/schwarzenegger.htmMarch 16, 2008noCalifornia took delivery of the first H2H (Hydrogen Hummer) in October 2004.cite webHUMMER H2H Hydrogen Powered Experimental VehicleAbout.comhttp://trucks.about.com/od/hybridcar/a/hummer_h2h.htmApril 18, 2008WickellDale

Arnold Schwarzenegger has been involved with theSpecial Olympicsfor many years after they were founded by his ex-mother-in-law, Eunice Kennedy Shriver.cite newshttp://www.forbes.com/2006/05/04/cx_me_0505featslide_8.html?thisSpeedArnold Schwarzenegger Charity: Special Olympics, After-School All-StarsMarch 22, 2012ForbesIn 2007, Schwarzenegger was the official spokesperson for the Special Olympics which were held in Shanghai, China.cite webhttp://www.looktothestars.org/celebrity/12-arnold-schwarzeneggerArnold Schwarzenegger Charity Work, Events and CausesMarch 22, 2012Schwarzenegger believes that quality school opportunities should be made available to children who might not normally be able to access them.cite webhttp://www.afterschoolallstars.org/site/apps/nlnet/content2.aspx?cBoard of DirectorsMarch 22, 2012In 1995, he founded the Inner City Games Foundation (ICG) which provides cultural, educational and community enrichment programming to youth.ICG is active in 15 cities around the country and serves over 250,000 children in over 400 schools countrywide.He has also been involved with After-School All-Stars, and founded the Los Angeles branch in 2002.cite webhttp://www.la-allstars.org/index.php/about-joomlaAfter-School All-Stars, Los AngelesMarch 22, 2012ASAS is an after school program provider, educating youth about health, fitness and nutrition.

On February 12, 2010, Schwarzenegger took part in the Vancouver Olympic Torch relay. He handed off the flame to the next runner,Sebastian Coe.cite newshttp://olympics.thestar.com/2010/article/764519--how-vancouver-almost-lost-the-2010-olympicsHow Vancouver almost lost the 2010 Olympics – Vancouver 2010 OlympicsToronto StarFebruary 12, 2010March 8, 2010Toronto

Schwarzenegger is a lifelong supporter and "friend ofIsrael", and has participated in L.A.'s Pro-Israel rallycite webGovernor Arnold Schwarzenegger at L.A.'s Pro-Israel rallyhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?vDecember 28, 2013among other similar events.cite newsBenhorinYitzhakSchwarzenegger: I love Israelhttp://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4067508,00.htmlDecember 28, 2013[[Ynet]]

In 2012, Schwarzenegger helped to found theSchwarzenegger Institute for State and Global Policy, which is a part of theUSC Sol Price School of Public Policyat theUniversity of Southern California.cite webhttp://www.schwarzenegger.com/issues/post/usc-schwarzenegger-institute-for-state-and-global-policyUSC Schwarzenegger Institute for State and Global Policy | Politics & Issues – Arnold SchwarzeneggerSchwarzenegger.comJanuary 22, 2015The Institute's mission is to "[advance] post-partisanship, where leaders put people over political parties and work together to find the best ideas and solutions to benefit the people they serve," and to "seek to influence public policy and public debate in finding solutions to the serious challenges we face."cite webhttp://schwarzenegger.usc.edu/about-the-institute/missionAbout the Institute | USC Schwarzenegger Institute for State and Global PolicySchwarzenegger.usc.eduJanuary 22, 2015Schwarzenegger serves as chairman of the Institute.cite webhttp://schwarzenegger.usc.edu/about-the-institute/about-the-institute-leadershipLeadership | USC Schwarzenegger Institute for State and Global PolicySchwarzenegger.usc.eduJanuary 22, 2015
